title: Chapter 4354 - Chapter 4354: 4353 Descended
body:
Chapter 4354 - Chapter 4354: 4353 Descended

Chapter 4354: 4353 descended

Translator: 549690339

“Has the Dragon King replied?”

“Not yet. We just sent a message over. The Dragon King can’t be so fast. If the Dragon King is busy right now, I’m afraid he’ll need more time!”

At the center of the Sword and Magic Universe.

Liu Lan and hopeless sky were floating in the sky as they spoke with grave expressions.

At this moment, they could only wait for news from the Dragon King. There was nothing they could do.

If the gigantic beast were to fly towards them at a rapid speed, they would have to lead their disciples to escape!

“Brother Wang Xian hasn’t replied to us yet, but he will be here soon!”

Long Yin spoke with confidence!

Buzz! Buzz

Buzz! Buzz

Roar

Just as long yin finished his sentence, there was a place below them.

There was a palace.

This palace was specially built by Liu Lan and Wang Xian for Wang Xian.

The entire palace took up a huge area.

It was majestic and magnificent. It was no weaker than the two forces of the Heaven’s origin.

However, at this moment, waves of terrifying energy rose from the palace.

Vast!

Barbaric!

Ancient!

Powerful!

Mysterious!

All kinds of powerful feelings instantly surged into the hearts of the surrounding disciples.

The disciples who were floating in the air felt an inexplicable pressure.

They felt a fear that came from the depths of their hearts.

Their eyes widened, and their faces were filled with shock.

Their bodies couldn’t help but fall down!

Countless powerful disciples fell to the ground like rain, looking in that direction in shock.

Liu Lan and Wang Wangtian’s eyes also focused!

At this moment, all the powerful disciples saw three enormous creatures appear above the palace.

The size of these three creatures was unbelievable to them.

How could there be such gigantic creatures in the world!

“It’s brother Wang Xian! Brother Wang Xian is here!”

At this moment, long yinyin was pleasantly surprised when he saw the creatures.

He had been to the Dragon Palace and knew the existence of Xiao Lan and the rest.

She looked up and searched for the figures of Wang Xian and the rest.

At this moment, all the strong disciples saw seven figures flying rapidly towards them from the gigantic beast in the middle!

“This? ? This is the Dragon King? That’s the Dragon King?”

“Hiss, what are these three gigantic beasts? Why do I feel that they are extremely terrifying? It’s even more terrifying than the might of the two of us!”

“Look at the six subordinates of the Dragon King. Their auras are equally terrifying. Are these all existences in the Heaven’s origin realm? Oh My God!”

“Is this the Dragon King’s influence? Who are these people of the Dragon King?”

In the surrounding area, all the strong disciples noticed Wang Xian’s figure. Their faces were filled with shock.

This way of appearance!

It was a complete descent!

Yes, a descent into their universe!

Liu Lan and Wang Wangtian looked at each other. Through each other’s eyes, they could see the deep shock in each other’s eyes.

They were strong cultivators in the Heaven’s origin realm. They could sense the strength of Wang Xian and the rest.

Even the weakest among them had their own strength.

Most of them thought that they were stronger than them.

Was this the Dragon King of the Dragon Palace in the nine-origin universe?

He was much stronger than the strength he displayed last time!

He brought nine existences in the Heavenly Yuan blessed realm here?

He was simply invincible!

It was easy for such existences to destroy their sword and Magic Universe!

“Dragon King!”

Liu Lan and hopeless sky moved their bodies and quickly went up to welcome him!

“D * MN, is this brother-in-law’s way of appearing? This is simply awesome! Ahhh!”

Long Yinhao looked at this scene with a look of admiration.

He followed long yinyin and quickly went up to welcome him!

“Brother-in-law, you’re finally here!”

Long Yinhao shouted excitedly!

“Brother Wang Xian!”

Long yinyin rolled his eyes at him and greeted Wang Xian with a smile!

“Okay!”

Wang Xian nodded with a smile and waved at long yinyin and the rest. “Yinyin, are you alright?”

“I’m Fine!”

Long yinyin shook his head!

“Greetings, Dragon Queen!”

“Greetings, Mistress!”

At the side, Demon Beisheng and the rest bowed to long yinyin!

As the Dragon Queen, all the disciples of the Dragon Palace knew about long yin.

She had also been to the Dragon Palace and stayed there for some time.

Although their strength had increased, the Dragon Queen’s position in the Dragon Palace was higher.

In the Dragon Palace, the Dragon King was in the lead, followed by the Dragon Queen, and then Prime Minister Gui.

Finally, they were the leaders!

Even though Prime Minister Gui had not reached the Heavenly Yuan realm yet.

After all, as the head butler of the Dragon Palace, he had always served the Dragon King and managed the Dragon Palace. They all respected Prime Minister Gui very much.

“Well, Hello!”

Long Yinyin’s face turned slightly red when he saw the experts treating his luggage so respectfully. He immediately replied!

Liu Lan and the others were shocked when they saw this scene.

These experts were all experts from the Dragon Palace?

They were all subordinates of the Dragon King?

This? ? ?

“Liu Lan and Wangtian, what exactly is going on?”

Wang Xian glanced toward the north and then looked at Liu Lan and Wangtian as he asked.

“Dragon King, we don’t know what is going on either. Not long ago, we heard a roar. When we rushed over, we saw an extremely huge beast wreaking havoc in our sword and Magic Universe!”

“Its body is incomparably huge. It can devour an entire city with just a single opening of its mouth. Its body size is comparable to the size of a magic kingdom. Its strength is extremely terrifying. After we rushed over and were discovered by it, it easily devoured us. We didn’t even manage to escape!”

Hopeless Sky’s expression was unsightly as he immediately said, “This huge beast’s strength is extremely terrifying!”

“Oh? A giant beast that suddenly broke into the nine-origin universe? What does it look like exactly?”

Wang Xian continued to ask them!

“It has an incomparably huge head. Its mouth occupies a large portion of its head. Its densely packed teeth are exposed outside. It’s extremely terrifying. Its body is like that of a crocodile!”

“That’s exactly what it looks like. In addition, we found a terrifying scar on the body of this giant beast. It should be injured.”

Liu Lan waved her arm and condensed the appearance of the giant beast.

“Eh? This Is?”

When Wang Xian saw the appearance of the giant beast condensed by Liu Lan, his gaze froze slightly!

“Dragon King, this is the heaven-devouring earth-eating beast emperor, one of the three Great Dao Beast Emperors in the starry universe. It likes to devour living beings and items with energy.”

At this moment, Hundun, who was at the back, saw this image and immediately spoke up!
